text: 6.27 Mat 3.17, Luk 3.22, Jon 1.33, 4.14, 6.48-58, Apo 2.22, 2 Pi 1.17 Tap mɨdup kuy gɨnɨgab ak, pɨyow ajebɨm ak ma gɨnɨmɨb agak. Tap mɨdup pel mɨdep ak pen, tap anɨb ak gek binɨb pel pelnep yenɨgabal ak, pɨyow ajebɨm ak gɨnɨmɨb agak. Tap mɨdup anɨb ak, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nɨbop ñɨnɨgab agak. Bapi God ne bɨ anɨb anop, bɨyad yɨbɨl agɨl ayɨp yek ak nɨm, tap anɨgɨl ñɨnɨgab agak.
